title: runtime: fatal error: malloc deadlock with Go 1.5.1
body:
A go-ethereum user reported a [crash](https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/issues/1962) with the following stack trace:
https://gist.github.com/CJentzsch/31aab5b31fae6805f893

The issue occurred on linux/arm with go-ethereum built using Go 1.5.1.
The binary in the trace [can be downloaded here](https://build.ethdev.com/builds/ARM%20Go%20develop%20branch/geth-ARM-20151103142042-1.4.0-dda3bf3.tar.bz2).
It does not seem to be reproducible, but looks similar to https://github.com/golang/go/issues/10469 (x/mobile issue on android/arm).
